name: py-pynio

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
PyNIO ("pie-nee-oh") is a Python module that allows read and/or write
access to a variety of scientific data formats popular in climate and
weather

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: libpng
dependencies.description: libpng is the official PNG reference library.

dependencies.name: jpeg
dependencies.description:
libjpeg-turbo is a fork of the original IJG libjpeg which uses SIMD to
accelerate baseline JPEG compression and decompression. libjpeg is a
library that implements JPEG image encoding, decoding and transcoding.

dependencies.name: zlib-api
dependencies.description:
A free, general-purpose, legally unencumbered lossless data-compression
library.

dependencies.name: netcdf-c
dependencies.description:
NetCDF (network Common Data Form) is a set of software libraries and
machine-independent data formats that support the creation, access, and
sharing of array-oriented scientific data. This is the C distribution.

dependencies.name: hdf5
dependencies.description:
HDF5 is a data model, library, and file format for storing and managing
data. It supports an unlimited variety of datatypes, and is designed for
flexible and efficient I/O and for high volume and complex data.

dependencies.name: gdal
dependencies.description:
GDAL: Geospatial Data Abstraction Library. GDAL is a translator library
for raster and vector geospatial data formats that is released under an
MIT style Open Source License by the Open Source Geospatial Foundation.
As a library, it presents a single raster abstract data model and single
vector abstract data model to the calling application for all supported
formats. It also comes with a variety of useful command line utilities
for data translation and processing.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-numpy
dependencies.description: Fundamental package for array computing in Python.
